meta.name: deepthink
meta.title: Deepthink
meta.description: Performs deep reasoning analysis on complex prompts.

original_definition.skill_description: Performs deep reasoning analysis on complex prompts.

actions.name: Capture Prompt Context
actions.description: Collect the full prompt and any required context.

actions.name: Run Deep Reasoning
actions.description: Perform multi-step reasoning to analyze the prompt.

actions.name: Synthesize Conclusion
actions.description: Condense the reasoning into a clear final response.

rules.name: Check Prompt Clarity
rules.condition_expression: Prompt includes a clear question or objective

rules.name: Validate Evidence Sufficiency
rules.condition_expression: Reasoning includes sufficient evidence and assumptions

directives.name: Deep Analysis Delivered
directives.description: A deep reasoning analysis is delivered with a clear conclusion.

directives.name: Cite Assumptions
directives.description: Explicitly surface key assumptions in the analysis.
